channel.title: Hamachi server +?
channel.description:
I'm using Hamachi, but can anyone tell how it really work. I readed guides but there is only "Download hamachi and play"... And and need i change all 127.0.0.1 ips to my server ip eg (somescape.no-ip.org) or is there only some ips what i need change? And if i change Client 127.0.0.1 ips to my server ip, i dont go my server...
E: And i have No-ip active.
I hope you understand this bad english..
Please help.
-P-

item.title: Hamachi server +?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

u have to have hamachi the downloaded on both and on your other computer just click join network or something and typr ur adress (name) and (pass) then u should get in and meeting both of your computers[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 12:48:03 pm[/size][hr]i think u have to switch 127.0.0.1 in GUI with the hamachi ip
idk i want to do it i have neva used hamachi
sombody help uss

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi server +?

item.description:
@Pehmis wrote:

Only in gui file?
If i have Hamachi ip in gui, and client 127.0.0.1 i can log in. But i cant log in my second computer. (it have too hamachi ip and client ip)
